name: Hadaka Shitsuji - Naked Butlers
description:
Description & FeaturesA butler-bullying Visual Novel for people who love butlers by people who love butlers!


- Traditional Visual Novel with multiple endings
- Over 500 beautifully drawn CGs to unlock
- 30+ hours of average reading time
- Story & Art developed by Mito TogoStoryOne day, our protagonist suddenly loses his job. Driven to his wit’s end, he happens upon a mysterious flyer:


“Daily wages: 30,000 yen. An easy job anyone can do! You can even sit around all day if you want. Interested applicants may apply at the following address.”

Feeling dubious, but lacking in any other options, our hero makes his way to the location listed in the flyer... where he finds a palatial estate with chalk-white walls and dazzling butlers.

According to the butlers, the owner of the estate is out of town, and as the butlers must continue to perform their duties even in his absence, they are searching for a “substitute master”. Our protagonist’s sadistic side begins to awaken as he continues to give them increasingly-preposterous orders...
